description.value:
Identical feathers radiate from the center of this spellheart, held in place by woven straw. The spell attack roll of any spell cast by Activating this item is +14, and the spell DC is 24.

  • Armor You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and resistance 5 to falling damage.
  • Weapon After you cast an air spell by Activating the wreath, you can Fly 5 feet as a single action, or you can Fly 25 feet as a free action if the spell you cast wasn't a cantrip. This must be your next action, and if you don't have a fly Speed, you must end the flight on solid ground or fall.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Five-Feather Wreath - Armor (Greater)]

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gale Blast].

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Wind].
